statements: SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE trade_price > 100
SELECT transaction_id, trade_date, trade_amount FROM transactions WHERE trade_amount < 0
SELECT exchange_name, base_currency, quote_currency FROM transactions WHERE trade_date = '2022-01-15'
SELECT trade_date, trade_time, trade_price, trade_amount FROM transactions WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance'
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE base_currency = 'BTC' ORDER BY trade_price DESC
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE base_currency = 'BTC' ORDER BY trade_date DESC, trade_time ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT transaction_id, exchange_name, trade_date, trade_time, trade_amount FROM transactions WHERE trade_price > 500 ORDER BY trade_price DESC;

SELECT exchange_name, base_currency, quote_currency, SUM(trade_amount) AS total_trade_amount FROM transactions GROUP BY exchange_name, base_currency, quote_currency HAVING total_trade_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_trade_amount DESC;
SELECT exchange_name, trade_date, SUM(trade_amount * trade_price) AS total_value FROM transactions WHERE trade_date >= '2022-01-01' GROUP BY exchange_name, trade_date;
SELECT DISTINCT exchange_name, base_currency, quote_currency FROM transactions WHERE trade_price BETWEEN 100 AND 200 ORDER BY exchange_name, base_currency;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, crypto_type, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance';
SELECT exchange_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY exchange_name;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM exchange_fees WHERE fee_type = 'Withdrawal' ORDER BY fee_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT exchange_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY exchange_name;
SELECT t.transaction_id, t.exchange_name, f.fee_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN exchange_fees f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id WHERE f.fee_type = 'transaction_fee';
SELECT exchange_name, COUNT(*) AS total_transactions FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY exchange_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 10;

SELECT t.exchange_name, t.crypto_type, SUM(f.fee_amount) AS total_fees FROM cryptocurrency_transactions t JOIN exchange_fees f ON t.transaction_id = f.transaction_id GROUP BY t.exchange_name, t.crypto_type ORDER BY total_fees DESC;
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions;
SELECT user_id, amount, timestamp FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE transaction_type='buy' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT exchange_id, exchange_name, country FROM cryptocurrency_exchanges WHERE country='USA';
SELECT user_id, user_name, email, phone_number FROM users WHERE country='Canada' ORDER BY registration_date ASC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_name, email, country FROM users JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ON users.user_id = cryptocurrency_transactions.user_id WHERE transaction_type = 'buy' GROUP BY user_name;
SELECT exchange_name, country, registration_date FROM cryptocurrency_exchanges WHERE country = 'USA' AND registration_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT user_id, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY user_id HAVING total_amount > 5000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;

SELECT user_name, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM users JOIN cryptocurrency_transactions ON users.user_id = cryptocurrency_transactions.user_id WHERE country = 'Canada' GROUP BY user_name HAVING total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions LIMIT 10;
SELECT exchange_name, trade_type, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount >= 1000;
SELECT user_id, username, country FROM users WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM exchanges WHERE country='Japan' ORDER BY exchange_name ASC;
SELECT symbol, name, market_cap FROM cryptocurrencies WHERE market_cap > 1e9 ORDER BY market_cap DESC;
SELECT * FROM transactions ORDER BY timestamp DESC, amount ASC
SELECT exchange_name, COUNT(*) FROM transactions GROUP BY exchange_name
SELECT * FROM users WHERE country='USA' AND email LIKE '%gmail.com%'
SELECT exchanges.exchange_name, cryptocurrencies.symbol FROM exchanges JOIN cryptocurrencies ON exchanges.exchange_id = cryptocurrencies.cryptocurrency_id
SELECT MAX(amount), MIN(amount), AVG(amount) FROM transactions GROUP BY exchange_name
SELECT * FROM transactions;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT exchange_name, location, country FROM exchanges ORDER BY location DESC;
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT fee_type, amount, currency_id FROM fees WHERE amount < 50 ORDER BY amount ASC;
SELECT * FROM transactions WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY transaction_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT transaction_date, from_address, to_address, amount FROM transactions JOIN exchanges ON transactions.exchange_id = exchanges.exchange_id WHERE exchange_name = 'Binance' AND country = 'United States';
SELECT user_name, email FROM users WHERE registration_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, amount FROM transactions WHERE from_address = '0x123abc' OR to_address = '0x456def' ORDER BY transaction_date ASC;

SELECT exchange_name, location, COUNT(transaction_id) AS total_transactions FROM exchanges LEFT JOIN transactions ON exchanges.exchange_id = transactions.exchange_id GROUP BY exchange_name, location HAVING COUNT(transaction_id) > 5;
